attributes.action: ban the use of glasses and glass bottles in pubs, clubs and winebars.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Statistics show that over 5000 glass related crimes occur in public drinking places every year, causing death, disfiguration and PTSD to the victims and their families. Please support this cause so other families don't have to suffer the terrible effects these crimes have.
